<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">PQueue = std::priority&#95;queue&lt;std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt;&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to track all tentative recolorings so we can roll back any</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
